pages.text: The Storage Racks mod, included with MineColonies, provides a versatile and compact storage solution. $(br2)These racks offer an efficient way to organize your items with easy access and they look cool.
Craft a Storage Rack using inexpensive ingredients. $(br2)Each rack can hold multiple items.
Craft a Controller using the recipe below. $(br2)The Controller allows you to connect multiple storage racks together, making it easier to manage your storage.
Even if you're not using MineColonies, Storage Racks are a handy way to keep your storage organized and accessible. $(br2)Combine them with other storage mods for the ultimate organization system!
